product_name: The North Face Montana Mittens - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Tired of soggy mitts? Stay warm and dry with the waterproof, breathable and insulated Montana Mitts from The North Face. These alpine mitts offer high performance and a women-specific fit. HyVent(R) inserts are waterproof, windproof and breathable. Backs of hands have slightly more Heatseeker(TM) synthetic insulation than the palms. Synthetic-leather palms; fourchette-box construction keeps fingertips warm. Articulation keeps hands in their natural relaxed position. Removable Wrist Oven leash provides warmth when combined with a handwarmer. The North Face Montana Mitts for women provide full-coverage gauntlets to keep snow out. Closeout.
